short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate rule of 3 math problems effortlessly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you need to calculate some proportion math problem, such as "if 5 is 75%, then 10 is X". With this extension you can calculate this easily without having to memorize a formula.
